description: Try our easy to follow Quinoa & Goat's Cheese Fritters recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Quinoa & Goat's Cheese Fritters Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse quinoa in a sieve under running water. Place in a small saucepan with 1 cup water and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low, then cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until tender and water is absorbed. Transfer quinoa to a bowl. Set aside to cool.
Combine corn, capsicum, spring onion and flour with quinoa. Season.
Mash 80g of the cheese in a small bowl. Stir in egg. Combine with quinoa mixture.

Heat oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add 3-4 large spoonfuls of mixture to pan and cook for 3 minutes on each side or until golden and crisp. Repeat with remaining mixture. Serve with the salmon, rocket and remaining goatâ€™s cheese crumbled over.
